title: In-Wallet Onboarding for ADAholders
description: Current wallet software separates utility and education, creating a barrier for people to enter and to trust the crypto space and Cardano.
solution: By using chat-based onboarding in wallets we combine utility and information to create a user friendly and trustworthy experience.
experience: Sr. UX/UI Designer 10yr+. Social System Engineer. Member of Adagov. Re-inventing the UI for blockchain;conversational governance with Adagov
